titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duties on salmeterol xinafoate (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 4-hydroxy-a-(((6-(4-phenylbutoxy)hexyl)amino)-methyl)-1, 3-benzenedimethol, 1-hydroxy-2-naphthalenecarboxylate (salmeterol xinafoate bulk and dosage forms).
